turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I can help you with that. I will ask you a few questions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. Letâ€™s get started.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What Starbucks location did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order from the location at 3446 29th Street, Grandrapids, Michigan

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a cafe mocha espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to have whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How would you like to pay for it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am a rewards member. All of my information is on there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like to order it now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I just placed the order at 3446 29th Street, Grandrapids, Michigan. It will be ready for pickup shortly. I will send you a receipt via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.
